text:
Good 🧵 for all those pro-#vaccine people who are hesitant about #children's and #teens' #vaccination for #Covid19 because of the reports of some cases of #myocarditis in young persons having been #vaccinated.
[This #vaccine has been approved by @CDCgov, @EMA_News & @MHRAgovuk] https://t.co/FvjECfLNa2
